amendment.description: To provide for a brownfields demonstration program for qualified green building and sustainable design projects, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3118 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 23. Record Vote Number: 84.

action.text: Amendment SA 3118 proposed by Senator Allard. To provide for a brownfields demonstration program for qualified green building and sustainable design projects, and for other purposes.
